name: neo4j-mcp
description: MCP server for MicroStrategy to Power BI migration - query metrics, attributes, dependencies and lineage.

NEO4J_READ_ONLY.title: Readonly flag
NEO4J_READ_ONLY.description: Set to true to disable write tools

NEO4J_TELEMETRY.title: Telemetry
NEO4J_TELEMETRY.description: Set to false to disable telemetry (default true)

NEO4J_LOG_LEVEL.title: Log Level
NEO4J_LOG_LEVEL.description: Log level (e.g., debug, info, notice, warning, error, critical, alert, emergency)

NEO4J_LOG_FORMAT.title: Log Format
NEO4J_LOG_FORMAT.description: Log output format: text or json (default text)

NEO4J_SCHEMA_SAMPLE_SIZE.title: Schema inference sample size
NEO4J_SCHEMA_SAMPLE_SIZE.description: Number of nodes to sample for schema inference

tools.name: get-metric-by-guid
tools.description: Get detailed information about a MicroStrategy Metric by its GUID

tools.name: get-attribute-by-guid
tools.description: Get detailed information about a MicroStrategy Attribute by its GUID

tools.name: search-metrics
tools.description: Search for MicroStrategy Metrics by name and filters

tools.name: search-attributes
tools.description: Search for MicroStrategy Attributes by name and filters

tools.name: get-reports-using-metric
tools.description: Find reports/documents that use a specific Metric

tools.name: get-reports-using-attribute
tools.description: Find reports/documents that use a specific Attribute

tools.name: get-metric-source-tables
tools.description: Find source database tables that feed a Metric

tools.name: get-attribute-source-tables
tools.description: Find source database tables that feed an Attribute

tools.name: get-metric-dependencies
tools.description: Find what a Metric depends on (downstream dependencies)

tools.name: get-attribute-dependencies
tools.description: Find what an Attribute depends on (downstream dependencies)

tools.name: get-metric-dependents
tools.description: Find what depends on a Metric (upstream - reports, other metrics)

tools.name: get-attribute-dependents
tools.description: Find what depends on an Attribute (upstream - reports, metrics)

tools.name: list-gds-procedures
tools.description: List GDS procedures available in the instance
